version_description:
Changes of version 1.20.0
- Long-awaited final of the Chapter VII: incredible bosses, scenic locations and the story pinnacle;
- New Transfomation story mode: unexpected storyline and even harder fights that will be a challenge for the most experienced fighters;
- New equipment including a brand new fight style, both agile and attractive;
- 3 new titled sets, each with a unique fight bonus;
- Several bugs fixed, also general performance of the game improved.

Changes of version 1.20.1
- New Family Tree event, full of Korean New Year spirit; new fight mechanics and a unique equipment set;
- Long-awaited final of the Chapter VII: incredible bosses, scenic locations and the story pinnacle;
- New Transfomation story mode: unexpected storyline and even harder fights that will be a challenge for the most experienced fighters;
- New equipment including a brand new fight style, both agile and attractive;
- 3 new titled sets, each with a unique fight bonus;
- Several bugs fixed, also general performance of the game improved.

Changes of version 1.20.2
- Long-awaited final of the Chapter VII: incredible bosses, scenic locations and the story pinnacle;
- New Transfomation story mode: unexpected storyline and even harder fights that will be a challenge for the most experienced fighters;
- New equipment including a brand new fight style, both agile and attractive;
- 3 new titled sets, each with a unique fight bonus;
- Critical bugs fixed, also general performance of the game improved.

Changes of version 1.20.3
- Long-awaited final of the Chapter VII: incredible bosses, scenic locations and the story pinnacle;
- New Transfomation story mode: unexpected storyline and even harder fights that will be a challenge for the most experienced fighters;
- New equipment including a brand new fight style, both agile and attractive;
- 3 new titled sets, each with a unique fight bonus;
- Critical bugs fixed, also general performance of the game improved.

Version 1.21.0 features:
- Players can now customize their equipment sets or separate items to give their characters unique looks.
- 3 expressive skins for Divine Judge, Warmonger and Star Chaser equipment sets added.
- 15 dyes of different rarity are now available for even bolder style experiments.
- New marathons and booster pack types added.
- Many techical improvements added, also many bugs fixed. Stability of the game performance is increased.

Version 1.21.2 features:
- New bonuses for Arrow and Shadow Artisan equipment sets, which were chosen by players of our community.
- Added technical framework for a future Legionary set bonus and also for new special events.
- A new free gems source added - Fyber.
- Many improvements added, many bugs fixed, increased overall game stability.

Version 1.23.0 is a special one; Shadow Fight 3 celebrates it's 3rd anniversary! We prepared many gifts and special activities for our players, and also a unique celebration minigame! Thank you for playing out game! Keep fighting!
New version is available! Many techical improvements added, also many bugs fixed.

Version 1.25.0 changes:
- Aspects, new color variations for equipment skins, are added into the game;
- Temporary Deep Color event launched with an opportunity to win a skin and some aspects;
- Many technical improvements and some UI improvements added;
- Technical support for the upcoming Marcus's Plane story chapter added.
